page.title: 19PUBLIC HOUSES/SUPERNATURAL
page.content:
{(A)PUBLIC HOUSES. { First of all {there were 2 pubs in the village in {Garvestone. They were opposite each {other but now there is one. It is {called "The King's Arms" and the {owners are Mr. and Mrs. Smith.There {are two main bars and a middle bar. {They have a ladies' darts team and a {men's darts team. They play darts {every Friday and they have a Pool {table.My dad is the captain of the {darts team.
(B) SUPERNATURAL. I saw a ghost. I thought it was Mrs Saddler who lived in the house before me and died there. The bedroom that I sleep in now used to be Mrs Saddler's room. My aunt Rita and I saw her.She was a silver lady.
